PERSONA.NAME: Egeon
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A merchant of Syracuse, father of Antipholus

PERSONA.NAME: Antipholus of Ephesus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Twin brother of Antipholus of Syracuse, son of Egeon and Aemelia

PERSONA.NAME: Antipholus of Syracuse
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Twin brother of Antipholus of Ephesus, son of Egeon and Aemelia

PERSONA.NAME: Dromio of Ephesus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Twin brother of Dromio of Syracuse, attendant on Antipholus of Ephesus

PERSONA.NAME: Dromio of Syracuse
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Twin brother of Dromio of Ephesus, attendant on Antipholus of Syracuse

PERSONA.NAME: Aemilia
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Wife to Egeon, mother of Antipholus, Lady Abbess at Ephesus

PERSONA.NAME: Adriana
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Wife of Antipholus of Ephesus, sister to Luciana

PERSONA.NAME: Luciana
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Sister to Adriana, a single woman.

PERSONA.NAME: Luce
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also known as Nell, servant to Adriana

PERSONA.NAME: Courtezan
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An entertainer to Antipholus of Ephesus, accuses him of stealing her ring.
